amendment.description: To provide funding to protect and promote media freedoms in Russia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1978 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1978 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S13344-13345; text: CR S13344) To provide funding to protect and promote media freedoms in Russia.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1978 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1978 proposed by Senator McConnell.
